00046     struct FileInfo {
00049         Archive* archive;
00051         String filename;
00053         String path;
00055         String basename;
00057         size_t compressedSize;
00059         size_t uncompressedSize;
00060     };
00061 
00062     typedef std::vector<FileInfo> FileInfoList;
00063     typedef SharedPtr<FileInfoList> FileInfoListPtr;
00064 
00081     class _OgreExport Archive : public ArchiveAlloc
00082     {
00083     protected:
00085         String mName; 
00087         String mType;
00088     public:
00089 
00090 
00093         Archive( const String& name, const String& archType )
00094             : mName(name), mType(archType) {}
00095 
00098         virtual ~Archive() {}
00099 
00101         const String& getName(void) const { return mName; }
00102 
00104         virtual bool isCaseSensitive(void) const = 0;
00105 
00113         virtual void load() = 0;
00114 
00120         virtual void unload() = 0;
00121 
00131         virtual DataStreamPtr open(const String& filename) const = 0;
00132 
00143         virtual StringVectorPtr list(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00144         
00153         virtual FileInfoListPtr listFileInfo(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00154 
00167         virtual StringVectorPtr find(const String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00168             bool dirs = false) = 0;
00169 
00171         virtual bool exists(const String& filename) = 0; 
00172 
00174         virtual time_t getModifiedTime(const String& filename) = 0; 
00175 
00176 
00187         virtual FileInfoListPtr findFileInfo(const String& pattern, 
00188             bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false) = 0;
00189 
00191         const String& getType(void) const { return mType; }
00192         
00193     };
